result.execSummary:
The defendant Jason A. VanSleet was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Methamphetamine [Modifiers: Repeater], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: FTE/FT schooling or combination thereof, and for any time he is not, community service at agent discretion.

Absolute Sobriety.

No possession of Drugs or Alcohol unless prescribed and then to be taken only as prescribed.

No contact with T.K., M.N., W.C., and J.S. (Previous Co-Defendants, as listed in PSI) unless approved by Agent.

Any assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by PO.

AODA and any follow up recommended.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Clerk Cheree
Cases 15CF1049, 16CF970, 18CF272 and 17CF1084 called: 10:32am
State appears by ADA K.Mayo; Defendant appears in person/in custody/with Atty Brian Van Ells.

COURT notes review of original PSI and a sentencing memorandum from defense along with CV filed.
Argument on sentence recommendation by State.
Argument on sentence recommendation by defense.
Restitution in 16CF970 is not agreed upon - State is requsting $6500 as restitution, and Atty Van Ells argues that defendant does not owe any restitution.
Defendant makes statement.

COURT makes findings; COURT ORDERS FOLLOWING>>

15CF1049 - Ct. 1 (Poss Meth/Rep)>> 4 years TOTAL: 2 years incarceration and 2 years ES; (No credit)
16CF970 - Ct. 2 (Receive Stolen Prop/Rep)>> 4 years TOTAL: 2 years incarceration and 2 years ES; credit for 3 days of time already served
17CF1084 - Ct. 3 (Maintain Drug Traff Place/Rep)>> 4 years TOTAL: 2 years incarceration and 2 years ES; credit for 100 days of time already served
17CF1084 - Ct. 4 (Felony BJ/Rep)>> 4 years TOTAL: 2 years incarceration and 2 years ES; credit for 100 days of time already served
18CF272 - Ct. 1 (Poss w/Int-Amphet)>> 8 years TOTAL: 4 years incarceration and 4 years ES; credit for 388 days of time already served
>>ALL sentences to run CONCURRENT to each other.
>>CONDITIONS of ES: Any assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by PO; AODA and any follow up recommended; Absolute sobriety; No possession of drugs or alcohol unless prescribed and then to be taken only as prescribed; CC; DNA surcharge (sample already provided); No contact with T.K., M.N., W.C., J.S. (Previous co-defendants, as listed in PSI) unless approved by agent; FTE/FT schooling or combination thereof, and for any time he is not, community service at agent discretion.
>>Defendant IS eligible for both CIP and SAP on all files
>>Both parties will be keeping PSI and agree to doing so confidentially.
>>Defendant is remanded to WI State Prison System.

Matter to be set for Restitution Hearing in 16CF970>> CC 4/4/19 at 1:00pm (Parties to discuss matter together)
from Jacqueline Schmidt MSW enclosing CV
